name: Minecraft Litematica Schematic
summary: A LITEMATIC file is a schematic created by Litematica (Fabric Minecraft Modloader), a mod for Minecraft. It is similar to a .SCHEM file in that it contains a blueprint of an area within a Minecraft world that a player can share and replicate. For example, Minecraft gamers often create schematics for structures, such as castles or factories, and save them as LITEMATIC files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
